name: Shory Aeromancer
prereq: Garundi Ethnicity, Mauxi Ethnicity, Or Tian-yae Ethnicity
summary: Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you.
description:
Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you. You can cast 4th-level fly on yourself as an innate arcane spell once per day.Shory Aeromancer Leads To...

Shory AerialistTraitsHuman: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
